message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $95. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $92. It's the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $88?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $90, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $87?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm going to have to draw a line here. I'm sticking to my original offer of $90. It's the best deal I can give you.
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I think I'll go with John's offer of $120 instead.
